title: Colloids
creator_credit: Piers Jessop and Cammell Hudson Productions
brief_description: An explanation of the behaviour of particles suspended in a medium of which commonplace examples are milk, clouds and stained glass. Describes the factors involved in colloid formation. Discusses the importance of colloid chemistry to industry, the understanding of which is an essential part of today’s technology.
